column1: (Millions of Moldovan lei, unless otherwise indicated)
Est.       Proj.       Proj.       Proj.       Proj.       Proj.       Proj.
Sources: Moldovan authorities; and IMF staff estimates and projections.
1/ As of 2016, capital transfers are excluded from transfers to economy and recorded under capital expenditure.
2/ Includes banking sector resolution costs in 2016.
3/ Augmented balance includes externally financed on-lending to SOEs.
4/ Starting with combined 4th and 5th review, includes domestic guarantees and domestic debt of SOEs.
5/ Includes central bank liabilities to the IMF.
